DoaEngine 3.0 API Documentation

This is the DoaEngine documentation overview.

DoaEngine is a project that is intended to assist writing games in 2D space using the Java programming language.
It is build upon the Sun Microsystem's Graphics Context, which is then refactored to "AWT Graphics". For more information on this: Swing Graphics.

Getting Started.

Follow the project on GitHub.

Send a mail to the developer.

Packages 
Package Description
doa.engine  
doa.engine.core
Engine Core.
doa.engine.graphics
Lights, sprites, graphics context...
doa.engine.input
Mouse & Keyboard Event Polling.
doa.engine.log
Logger and other output.
doa.engine.maths
Math & Algebra related small toolkit.
doa.engine.net
Networking API.
doa.engine.physics
Physics engine.
doa.engine.scene
Scene, scene object and builders.
doa.engine.scene.elements
Pre-made components that don't fall into the categories of either "Renderer", "Script", or "Physics Component".
doa.engine.scene.elements.physics
Physics related components.
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers
Renderers.
doa.engine.scene.elements.scripts  
doa.engine.sound
Sound & Audio playing API.
doa.engine.task
Threading & Tasking API.
doa.engine.utils
Utility toolkit.
doa.engine.utils.discordapi  
doa.main.test
